title: (x) Vintage fonts with little flourishes on serifs - various {gang}
content:
I am trying to find a few different fonts that are similar to this sample.  
Can anybody offer the name of a few fonts that look like this?  
It does not have to match exactly - just looking for fonts with the same feel.  
Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Late-July-Type.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818093310/http:/typophile.com/files/Late-July-Type.gif) | 92.21 KB |
author: Bailiwick

comments.content:
You could try [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818093310/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/") they have some nice fonts in that vain.

Rob
Also see [Kilkenny](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818093310/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/kilkenny.html) from IHOF designed by our own, Paul Hunt.
